About

We are a startup based in the Technology Bussiness Incubator at the
Natioanl Institute of Technology, Calicut, Kerala India.

Our focus is to empower the next generation enterprises with advanced mobile applications.

We are quick, flexible and focused clearly on a simple design-oriented approach.

We would like to hear from you. Get in touch with us.

Let's Talk?

Feel free to contact us for any inquiries, if you have any questions about our work or just say hello.
